mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (report_no, reporter_id, reported_id, report_category, report_content, report_status, report_date file1, file2, file3, del_code) VALUES (seq_report_report_no.NEXTVAL, #{reporter.id}, #{reported.id}, #{reportCategory}, #{reportContent}, #{reportStatus}, SYSDATE, #{file1}, #{file2:VARCHAR}, #{file3:VARCHAR}, #{delCode:CHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT report_no, reporter_id, reported_id, report_category, report_content, report_status, report_date, del_code, file1, file2, file3 FROM report WHERE report_no=#{reportNo}
